name: Explorer by Jim Gerrie
description:
Here is another entry for 256 Extreme.

 

EXPLORER is a text adventure for the TRS-80 MC-10. It’s based on the layout of a classic mini-adventure by Clive Gifford from his book : Mysterious Adventures for Your Amstrad.

But this one fits into 10 lines and avoids all of the bugs of the original.

 

The source code can be viewed here:

https://github.com/jggames/trs80mc10/tree/master/quicktype/Text%20Adventures/Explorer

 

EXPLORER can be played online here by selecting it from the Cassette menu and typing RUN:

http://faculty.cbu.ca/jgerrie/MC10/Australasian.html

 

The VMC10, with EXPLORER in the JimG dir of the Cassette dir can be downloaded here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IZ7z84dlKLHu8IBOzNpFKbX4N3C03r8I/view?usp=sharing

Just type CLOAD and hit and then select EXPLORER.C10 from the JimG dir.  Then type RUN and hit
